{
    "packageId": "6506f0bd4e8ea20100b5e2fe",
    "title": "4 Worlds Ecuador 14 Days / 13 Nights",
    "description": "Ecuador is a relatively small territory characterized by 4 distinct regions and hundreds of distinct ecosystems where culture and bio-diversity alike have flourished pristine and unique, minutes away from each other ... enjoy Ecuador.",
    "discountPercentage": 30,
    "availableTickets": 40,
    "price": 100,
    "availableDates": "Year-Round",

        "Galapagos"
    ],

}

    "title": "Classic Galapagos Experience 5 Days / 4 Nights",
    "description": "A best-selling combination of tours and free time to explore and enjoy the two main islands; this 5-day package includes a round-trip flight Quito-Baltra-Isabela.",

{
    "accommodationId": "6506f4c74e8ea20100b5e312",
    "title": "Hostería Izhcayluma",
    "description": "An ideal place in the \"Valley of Longevity¨, Vilcabamba valley in Loja. Relax a few days and enjoy the varied activities that the valley offers; the hotel offers rooms with private bathroom to private and quiet cabins, with a privileged view of this \"sacred\" valley of Vilcabamba, it also has a swimming pool and gardens full of flowers, hammocks in the shade and the beauty of the landscape; enjoy panoramic views, which offer a wide variety of both Ecuadorian and international cuisine.",

{
    "eventPlanningId": "6506f6ee4e8ea20100b5e31a",
    "title": "Spiritual Gatherings and Retreats Destination Event Planning",
    "description": "Discover two of South America's greatest cities, Rio de Janeiro and Buenos Aires, at a leisurely pace. A major highlight on this journey is a visit to Iguassu Falls in between your two city stays. It truly is one of the most spectacular sights on Earth. See the impressive falls from both the Brazilian and Argentine sides. Brazil's view takes you through clouds of mist and the opportunity to see these 275 falls, spanning nearly two miles! Argentina's side allows you to walk along the boardwalk network and embark on a jungle train through the forest for unforgettable views. Hear the deafening roar and admire the brilliant rainbows created by the clouds of spray, and take in the majesty of this wonder of the world.",
    "rating": 5,

{
    "rentalId": "6506f8a24e8ea20100b5e320",
    "title": "Casa Bonita, Canoa",
    "description": "Discover two of South America’s greatest cities, Rio de Janeiro and Buenos Aires, at a leisurely pace. A major highlight on this journey is a visit to Iguassu Falls in between your two city stays. It truly is one of the most spectacular sights on Earth. See the impressive falls from both the Brazilian and Argentine sides. Brazil's view takes you through clouds of mist and the opportunity to see these 275 falls, spanning nearly two miles! Argentina’s side allows you to walk along the boardwalk network and embark on a jungle train through the forest for unforgettable views. Hear the deafening roar and admire the brilliant rainbows created by the clouds of spray, and take in the majesty of this wonder of the world. From vibrant cities to scenic beauty, this vacation to Rio de Janeiro, Iguassu Falls, and Buenos Aires will leave you with vacation memories you’ll cherish for life.",

    "capacity": 7,
    "rating": 5,

{
    "tourId": "6506fade4e8ea20100b5e338",
    "title": "Fishing and Whale Watching",
    "description": "We'll set-out on this adventure from La Gavía Luxury Condominium Resort, within Club Casablanca, a beautiful beach, 9-hole golf club and Marina on the Ecuadorian coast. The beach has a distinct jungle-like feel, with big leafy trees intermingling with palms and brightly colored tropical flowers, as usual in the biologically diverse Chocó tropical forest, which extends along the coast from Panama to Ecuador. Seasonal whale and dolphin watching, along Marlin fishing are a delight; but the more common mahi-mahi, tuna, grouper, bighead tilefish, bearded brotula, barracuda, snook, weakfish, red snapper, and sand perch catch is the real year-round deal; enjoy the equatorial Pacific Ocean.",
    "price": 200,
    "duration": "5 Days/6 Nights",
    "rating": 5,
